name: Final Fantasy VII
description: Original PC game from 1995 (requires the 4 original cds)
notes: Added Custom OpenGL Driver by Aali from Qimm: http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=14922.0
content:
exe: drive_c/FFMODS/FF7/ff7.exe
files:
- opengldriver: /home/david//home/david/ff7_opengl-0.7.11b.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: ff7inst.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/ff7inst.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/FFMODS/FF7
    file: opengldriver
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC
